value.title: Here Come the Killer Robots

value.title: First Human To Receive Neuralink Chip Can Control Mouse With Mind, Claims Musk
value.excerpt: Earlier, in January, Musk revealed that Neuralink had managed to implant its wireless brain chip in a human for the first time. In a post on X, Musk said that "promising" brain activity was detected in the human after the procedure and that the person was "recovering well".
